fullText: Alfred Molina and Eddie Redmayne deliver powerhouse performances in John Logan's compelling two-hander about Mark Rothko's artistic process and philosophical struggles.
dtliExcerpt: Alfred Molina and Eddie Redmayne deliver powerhouse performances in John Logan's compelling two-hander about Mark Rothko's artistic process and philosophical struggles.
